pages.text: $(li)The Book and Quill will help you to take notes in all your journey.$(br)$(li)You can use it to craft an $(l:patchouli:tools/charm/atlas)Atlas$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)To use the Book and Quill, first you have to right click while you are holding the item on your hand.$(br)$(li)To save changes, just click in the Done button.$(br)$(li)Finally, if you want to make your book uneditable, click the Sign button, add a title and click the Sign and Close Button to confirm it.
$(li)Right click while you are holding this item in your hand to write on it. Use the Done button to save the changes.
$(li)Finally, if you want to make your book uneditable, click the Sign button, add a title and click the Sign and Close Button to confirm it.
